content.raw:
I was testing this with drcsim, two needed modifications:

 - For drcsim, [pull request 443](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/drcsim/pull-request/443/migrate-deprecation-code-in-gazebo-40/diff)
 - For ros_gazebo_pkgs, I've [create a new branch for the hydro-devel fixes](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/commit/629bcd876b3b34c306a40a4d2c3e249a55dbea55) but still need to figure out what would be the best way of keeping backwards compatibility with other versions of gazebo.
content.html:
I was testing this with drcsim, two needed modifications:

  • For drcsim, pull request 443
  • For ros_gazebo_pkgs, I've create a new branch for the hydro-devel fixes but still need to figure out what would be the best way of keeping backwards compatibility with other versions of gazebo.
